title: Bug 17825: Unexpected Beeping with SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText
description: When selecting SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, there is an unexpected beeping sound. It seems this behavior is unintended.
OB: Selecting SWT.MULTI triggers a beeping sound. Subsequent clicks on other buttons also produce the same bell sound.
EB: The expected behavior is to hear a Windows 'ding' sound (indicating an action that may be incorrect) when selecting SWT.MULTI.
SR:
1. Open ControlExampleText.
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe the unexpected beeping sound.
4. Click on other buttons to note the persistence of the bell sound.
